rows.label: tlk41300022_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I can't believe Iira came to this
city. I thought it was just a rumor.

rows.label: tlk41300022_02_msg0003
rows.name:
They rampaged on the Imperial Army's
Divine Beast battleship and even
destroyed the water tower...

rows.label: tlk41300022_02_msg0005
rows.name:
But it seems they've gone
somewhere else now. This
city has regained its peace.

rows.label: tlk41300022_02_msg0006
rows.name:
It's for the best that the self-defense corps didn't
have to get involved. There's no way we could win
against a group even the Flamebringer couldn't handle.
